review_title: Review for WHO Health emergencies team member
pros:
International team
Worked in co-ordination with government
Young & energetic team
cons:
Poor work life balance during Covid
Poor coordination within team

review_title: Great opportunities but not too great politics
pros: Truly a global organization. Lots of opportunities to provide genuine service in Global Health arena, be it in Country Office, Regional Office or HQ.
cons: Too political for everyone to handle. Country politics affects the organizational atmosphere.
